pullRequest.body:
We show that `RingHom.Flat` satisfies `RingHom.PropertyIsLocal`.

---

* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

```suggestion
    intro r; simp_rw [RingHom.Flat] at h
    convert h r; ext a x
```

```suggestion
    have : SMul.smul a x = algebraMap R (Localization.Away r.val) a * x := by
```

This works:
```suggestion
  refine Module.flat_of_isLocalized_span _ _ s hsp _
    (fun r â†¦ Algebra.linearMap S <| Localization.Away r.1) ?_
  dsimp only [RingHom.Flat] at h
  convert h; ext
  apply Algebra.smul_def
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(RingTheory/Flat): flat is a local property of ring homomorphisms
